question: Consider the following statements: 1.India to set up six large ground stations and more than 500 small terminals in Bhutan, Nepal, Maldives, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka and china. 2.The first of the ground stations, will be setup in Nepal. 3.Maldives will be adorned with disaster management centers in 100 of the 200 inhabited islands. Which one is not true in the above context?
explanation: India to set up five large ground stations and more than 500 small terminals in Bhutan, Nepal, Maldives, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka. The first of the five ground stations, will be setup in Bhutanâ€™s capital Thimphu.
